content.rendered:
Olifantsfontein, Midrand

440 Spacious apartments with a
Lifestyle Hub and free activities.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 34m² to 83m².

R6,800pm – R12,500pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Adjacent to Waterfall Area

1,250 Spacious apartments with a
Lifestyle Hub and free activities.

1, 2, 3, and 4-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 38m² to 132m².

R7,000pm – R18,100pm

Adjacent to Waterfall Area

1,800 Spacious apartments with a
Lifestyle Hub and free activities.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 32m² to 83m².

R6,900pm – R13,700pm

495 Well-appointed apartments with
schools, tight security and free activities.

1, 2, 3, 4-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 53m² to 175m².

R8,900pm – R21,700pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Crowthorne, Midrand

150 Well-appointed apartments with
schools, tight security and free activities.

1, 2, 3, 4-bedroom luxury apartments ranging from 48m² to 128m².

R8,300pm – R17,900pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Carlswald, Midrand

291 Exclusive apartments in an
award-winning environment.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments r
anging from 42m² to 108m².

R7,900pm – R15,600pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

Olifantsfontein, Midrand

270 Apartments, conveniently located
on Olifantsfontein Road in Midrand.

1, 2, 3-bedroom luxury apartments
ranging from 30m² to 76m².

R6,800pm – R11,300pm

EXPLORE ESTATE

OUR LIFESTYLE APARTMENTS IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
